subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Cardinals could not have asked for more from Anthony Reyes in Game 1, who compiled a 5-8 record and a 5.06 earned run average in 17 starts during the regular season.
snippet: The Cardinals could not have asked for more from Anthony Reyes in Game 1, who compiled a 5-8 record and a 5.06 earned run average in 17 starts during the regular season.
